review: The services offered and facilities provided were excellent. Accommodation is fairly priced and the staffs were extremely helpful. Food was excellent and views near the camp were truly breathtaking. Perfect for all sorts of travellers while visiting tsomoriri.
name: Souvik Roy

review: Situated at the scenic village of tsomoriri. The accommodation offers an unique experience to travellers. The views of tsomoriri from the camp is truly breathtaking. All the necessary amenities were kept ready and hospitality shall be cherished forever.
name: Hari
